settings.paragraph_text: Welcome to NYC Chic Hair Extensions. High quality Russian and Slavic Bundle hair can be purchased exclusively in the US. Professional extensions available in variety of colors, styles, types and lengths. Also try Ready-to-wear and complete master kit supplies and tools.

settings.heading_text: FIND A WAY TO COLOR MATCHING

settings.paragraph_text: Use our basic colors as a reference for your order. Choose a way to contact to us for more details.
